summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Survey360 guided tour feature. All major tour functionality working correctly including auto-start, 7-step navigation, progress tracking, spotlight effects, localStorage persistence, and restart capabilities.

ui_bugs.issue: Overlay click to skip tour has pointer event interception issues
ui_bugs.workaround: Skip Tour button works perfectly as alternative

passed_tests: Tour auto-starts on first visit to sandbox
Tour displays all 7 steps with correct step counter (Step X of 7)
Progress bar animates correctly through all steps
Welcome and completion messages display properly
Next button navigation works through all steps
Back button navigation works from step 2 onwards
Get Started button completes tour on final step
Take a Tour button restarts tour successfully
Skip Tour button closes tour and marks as completed
Spotlight effects highlight correct sections with teal box-shadow
Tour does not auto-start on subsequent visits after completion
All required data-tour attributes present on target elements
Tour card responsive on mobile viewport
X close button (via Skip Tour) functionality works
